name: @obewds/puff-js
description: The official repository for Puff.js, a Node.js and Typescript Library for OBE:WDS Design System packages.

scripts.tag: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag v$PACKAGE_VERSION && git push --tags
scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch && npm run build && npm run make-entrypoint
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor && npm run build && npm run make-entrypoint
scripts.bump:major: npm version major && npm run build && npm run make-entrypoint

author: Matt McT
